OG.content: [vis-à-vis Rousseau] writing as supplement, s’ajouter, suppléant, mediocre makeshift (pis-aller) [translated elsewhere as stopgap], surplus, plenitude added to plenitude, stranger, evil, fills a void
OG.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Rousseau] writing as supplement, s’ajouter, suppléant, mediocre makeshift (pis-aller) [translated elsewhere as stopgap], surplus, plenitude added to plenitude, stranger, evil, fills a void

OG.content: supplement as adjunct, subaltern instance that tient-lieu, becomes dangerous when representation claims to be presence/sign of thing itself
OG.linkedContent: supplement as adjunct, subaltern instance that tient-lieu, becomes dangerous when representation claims to be presence/sign of thing itself

OG.content: Nature doesn’t supplement herself, self-sufficient, no substitute for a mother’s love
OG.linkedContent: Nature doesn’t supplement herself, self-sufficient, no substitute for a mother’s love

OG.content: Rousseau: dividing of the mother’s right (nursing another woman’s child rather than one’s own is evil), [writing as substitute for mother], forcing her to see her child love another, every evil follows from this, whole moral order is disturbed
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau: dividing of the mother’s right (nursing another woman’s child rather than one’s own is evil), [writing as substitute for mother], forcing her to see her child love another, every evil follows from this, whole moral order is disturbed

OG.content: yet, Rousseau advocates a kind of natural supplement w/ culture, a suppléance > habit, pedagogy, both necessary & insufficient to reconstitute wholeness of mother nature
OG.linkedContent: yet, Rousseau advocates a kind of natural supplement w/ culture, a suppléance > habit, pedagogy, both necessary & insufficient to reconstitute wholeness of mother nature

OG.content: childhood first call for suppléance, first manifestation of deficiency, pedagogy crudely shows the paradox of supplement
OG.linkedContent: childhood first call for suppléance, first manifestation of deficiency, pedagogy crudely shows the paradox of supplement

OG.content: the scandal: sign becomes force, supplement as acting through hands of other, sign now moves the world
OG.linkedContent: the scandal: sign becomes force, supplement as acting through hands of other, sign now moves the world

OG.content: society as a furnace, man rummages the entrails (fouille les entrailles) of the earth, blindness to plants, nature, mother, moving from blindness to the supplement is the law, we can’t make supplement emerge from its shadow > we speak its reserve (nous en disons la réserve)
OG.linkedContent: society as a furnace, man rummages the entrails (fouille les entrailles) of the earth, blindness to plants, nature, mother, moving from blindness to the supplement is the law, we can’t make supplement emerge from its shadow > we speak its reserve (nous en disons la réserve)

OG.content: reason can’t think (and thus constituted by) this double infringement: there’s a lack in Nature and because of that very fact something is added to it, the supplement as image & representation of nature, image neither in nor out [Aristotle’s “neither for nor against”]
OG.linkedContent: reason can’t think (and thus constituted by) this double infringement: there’s a lack in Nature and because of that very fact something is added to it, the supplement as image & representation of nature, image neither in nor out [Aristotle’s “neither for nor against”]

OG.content: Derrida not looking for a truth signified in Rousseau but an engagement and appurtenance “qui enserrent dans le même tissu, le même texte, l’existence et l’écriture”—same [text, tissue] is here called supplement, another name for differance
OG.linkedContent: Derrida not looking for a truth signified in Rousseau but an engagement and appurtenance “qui enserrent dans le même tissu, le même texte, l’existence et l’écriture”—same [text, tissue] is here called supplement, another name for differance

OG.content: Rousseau: “suppléer en gagnant de vitesse sur l’experience,” dangerous habit of supplementing by out-distancing experience
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau: “suppléer en gagnant de vitesse sur l’experience,” dangerous habit of supplementing by out-distancing experience

OG.content: [Rousseau] masturbation pleasure irremediable loss of vital substance > exposure to madness & death
OG.linkedContent: [Rousseau] masturbation pleasure irremediable loss of vital substance > exposure to madness & death

OG.content: for Rousseau, danger of image, imaginary seduction, in writing & masturbation, “fatal advantage (funeste avantage)” > the supplement that “trompe (cheats) la nature”
OG.linkedContent: for Rousseau, danger of image, imaginary seduction, in writing & masturbation, “fatal advantage (funeste avantage)” > the supplement that “trompe (cheats) la nature”

OG.content: slow place of pedagogy, Nature takes her time, outpaced by immediacy of dangerous supplement which burns the halting points (brûle les étapes), consumes l’énergie sans retour
OG.linkedContent: slow place of pedagogy, Nature takes her time, outpaced by immediacy of dangerous supplement which burns the halting points (brûle les étapes), consumes l’énergie sans retour

OG.content: Rousseau: all evil caused because mothers shirk their duty as mothers
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau: all evil caused because mothers shirk their duty as mothers

OG.content: Rousseau: I only felt strength of attachment to my mother, when I no longer saw her
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau: I only felt strength of attachment to my mother, when I no longer saw her

OG.content: dangerous supplement inconceivable to reason: no longer diverting total enjoyment toward a substitute, but experiencing it or miming it directly and in its totality [not kissing the bed to get close to Mamma, but conjuring the presence of Mamma]
OG.linkedContent: dangerous supplement inconceivable to reason: no longer diverting total enjoyment toward a substitute, but experiencing it or miming it directly and in its totality [not kissing the bed to get close to Mamma, but conjuring the presence of Mamma]

OG.content: [vis-à-vis Rousseau] masturbation, contingent evil, model of perversion: summon absent beauties, one corrupts oneself by oneself (on s’altère soi-même)
OG.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Rousseau] masturbation, contingent evil, model of perversion: summon absent beauties, one corrupts oneself by oneself (on s’altère soi-même)

OG.content: restitution of presence by language: symbolic/immediate, se passe de passer par le monde: touching is touched, jouissance not deferred: auto-affection se donne pour autarcie pure, it does not wait (n’attend pas) > but, auto-affection pure speculation, present delivered is chimera, the no longer deferred is absolutely deferred: acc. Rousseau, sign/image/representation sont des illusions qui donnent le change (sidetrack us) [differance w/out delay]

OG.content: Rousseau’s pernicious habit of donner la change [satisfying his wants, sidetracking, giving money]
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau’s pernicious habit of donner la change [satisfying his wants, sidetracking, giving money]

OG.content: supplement is maddening, it breaches/broaches (entame) our pleasure and our virginity [hymen]

OG.content: supplement not only procures an absent presence, it distances, masters, protects: supplement transgresses and à la fois respects interdict (acc. play/difference of forces)

OG.linkedContent: for Rousseau, as dangerous as the supplement is, cohabitation w/ women is even more dangerous, “jouir!” another name for death

OG.content: for Rousseau, auto-eroticism (preference for sign) as protection from mortal expenditure; use of dangerous supplement morally redeemable > hurts only me
OG.linkedContent: for Rousseau, auto-eroticism (preference for sign) as protection from mortal expenditure; use of dangerous supplement morally redeemable > hurts only me

OG.linkedContent: Rousseau looks for a supplement to take complete possession of his heart (remplit mon coeur) > a substitute for mother (another girl)

OG.linkedContent: this sequence of supplements announces necessity of an infinite chain of substitutes: immediacy is derived > that’s what’s inconceivable to reason

OG.content: Rousseau: no intermediary btwn everything & nothing, must substitute
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau: no intermediary btwn everything & nothing, must substitute

OG.content: supplement as chain itself, theory of textuality, en abyme, structural necessity of abyss, desire of presence born in abyss
OG.linkedContent: supplement as chain itself, theory of textuality, en abyme, structural necessity of abyss, desire of presence born in abyss

OG.content: supplement itself is exorbitant, in every sense of the word
OG.linkedContent: supplement itself is exorbitant, in every sense of the word

OG.content: deconstruction: relate founding categories of metaphysics to the supplement
OG.linkedContent: deconstruction: relate founding categories of metaphysics to the supplement

OG.content: concept of supplement as blind spot (tache aveugle) in Rousseau: the not seen that opens & limits visibility

OG.content: that we know this now a priori: not a knowledge at all
OG.linkedContent: that we know this now a priori: not a knowledge at all

OG.content: supplement/onanism: contournent un danger et réservent une dépense > in spite & thanks to them, we’re authorized to see the sun, the light that keeps us on surface of mine [see pp. 148-49 furnace, blindness]

OG.content: w/ 2 supplements (writing, onanism), auto-affection manifests by leaving a trace of itself in the world, exteriority of space, touchant-touché admits the world as 3rd party, here jouissance and se-donner-une-présence welcome the other in small difference separating l’agir du pâtir (doing from suffering)

OG.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Rousseau] writing: 1) effort to symbolically reappropriate presence 2) consecrates dispossession that had already dislocated parole

OG.content: masturbation & writing totally indistinguishable inasmuch as each puts into play (met en jeu) the presence of the present, the life of the living
OG.linkedContent: masturbation & writing totally indistinguishable inasmuch as each puts into play (met en jeu) the presence of the present, the life of the living

OG.content: logocentrism demands their difference
OG.linkedContent: logocentrism demands their difference

OG.content: exclusion of the supplement, of addition, can only function if one deems it pure [i.e. simple exteriority, pure addition] > for logocentric MOP addition is nothing, can’t add to full presence (being, essence, eidos, ousia)

OG.content: originary differance is supplementarity as structure: irreducible complexity of shifting play of absence/presence: metaphysics produced by it, doesn’t think it: writing is a representation of trace, trace itself does not exist > place of decision now hidden, but still indicated
OG.linkedContent: originary differance is supplementarity as structure: irreducible complexity of shifting play of absence/presence: metaphysics produced by it, doesn’t think it: writing is a representation of trace, trace itself does not exist > place of decision now hidden, but still indicated

OG.content: acc. Rousseau & Duclos [via Lévi-Strauss’ tribe w/out writing], degradation of politics/community caused by degradation of language—bad pronunciation, shortened words, caused by capital, aristocracy: speech of the assembly dispossessed from the people by written law (from Rome & Greece to empires of great distance)
OG.linkedContent: acc. Rousseau & Duclos [via Lévi-Strauss’ tribe w/out writing], degradation of politics/community caused by degradation of language—bad pronunciation, shortened words, caused by capital, aristocracy: speech of the assembly dispossessed from the people by written law (from Rome & Greece to empires of great distance)

OG.content: Rousseau contra Hobbes: pity/compassion is a natural law (beasts have it too), mother’s law, law of the (soft) voice, pity “takes the place of” instituted law, supplements law [though it works the other way around too]; mother’s law, written in our hearts by God > natural writing, writing of heart—not reason, before reason: writing (of reason) is w/out pity, transgresses law of voice, a perverse passion
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau contra Hobbes: pity/compassion is a natural law (beasts have it too), mother’s law, law of the (soft) voice, pity “takes the place of” instituted law, supplements law [though it works the other way around too]; mother’s law, written in our hearts by God > natural writing, writing of heart—not reason, before reason: writing (of reason) is w/out pity, transgresses law of voice, a perverse passion

OG.content: for Rousseau, first there is self-love (l’amour de soi) [not unnatural l’amour-propre], and then love of the (m)other > pity is a suppléant, which can be supplanted by law/society
OG.linkedContent: for Rousseau, first there is self-love (l’amour de soi) [not unnatural l’amour-propre], and then love of the (m)other > pity is a suppléant, which can be supplanted by law/society

OG.linkedContent: pity protects man, vir, homo against love of woman, against the becoming (child becoming-man, mother becoming-woman) that is the great substitution > pity saves virility

OG.content: for Rousseau, amorous passion perversion of natural pity—limits our attachment to a single person
OG.linkedContent: for Rousseau, amorous passion perversion of natural pity—limits our attachment to a single person

OG.content: jealousy, a creation of culture, an arresting of nature by woman, stratagem of femininity > invention of culture denatures pity [which should reach out to every living thing]
OG.linkedContent: jealousy, a creation of culture, an arresting of nature by woman, stratagem of femininity > invention of culture denatures pity [which should reach out to every living thing]

OG.content: jealousy marks the gap btwn pity/love
OG.linkedContent: jealousy marks the gap btwn pity/love

OG.content: Rousseau: woman’s commands are caresses, her threats are tears, she manages the commander
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau: woman’s commands are caresses, her threats are tears, she manages the commander

OG.content: acc. Rousseau, God gave man reason and woman modesty to supplement (a lack = an excess), restrain, guide natural inclinations, & God gave a bonus (praemium) too, a recompense, reward [for correct usage of supplement], a supplement to the supplement [Christianity]

OG.linkedContent: acc. Rousseau, “moral love” not biology but power of imagination > all depravity of culture related to possession of women (movement of preference/difference)

OG.content: imagination, for Rousseau, is more proper to man than reason > pity is born of imagination
OG.linkedContent: imagination, for Rousseau, is more proper to man than reason > pity is born of imagination

OG.content: imagination inaugurates perfectibility & liberty [whereas animal sensibility is passive, fixed] > activates pity
OG.linkedContent: imagination inaugurates perfectibility & liberty [whereas animal sensibility is passive, fixed] > activates pity

OG.linkedContent: imagination belongs to same chain of signification as anticipation of death, is le rapport à la mort > both imagination & death are representative and supplementary (dispossession)

OG.content: for Rousseau, proper of man is fear of death

OG.content: for Rousseau, the wand (la baguette) that traces w/ so much pleasure does not fall outside the body (ne tombe pas hors du corps)

OG.content: le mouvement de la baguette este riche de tous les discours possible mais aucun discours ne peut le reproduire sans l’appauvrir et le déformer—movement of the wand is a substitute (supplée) for all discourse that, at a greater distance, would substitute itself for it [how, for Rousseau, writing will correct speech if it doesn’t precede it]
OG.linkedContent: le mouvement de la baguette este riche de tous les discours possible mais aucun discours ne peut le reproduire sans l’appauvrir et le déformer—movement of the wand is a substitute (supplée) for all discourse that, at a greater distance, would substitute itself for it [how, for Rousseau, writing will correct speech if it doesn’t precede it]

OG.content: graphic supplementarity is origin which separates gesture & parole in the city
OG.linkedContent: graphic supplementarity is origin which separates gesture & parole in the city

OG.content: Rousseau [sometimes] places hieroglyphic, passionate langue before speech, a writing that is proximate and present, he praises this savage writing—traces like the wand (baguette), un dessin dans l’espace (writing)
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau [sometimes] places hieroglyphic, passionate langue before speech, a writing that is proximate and present, he praises this savage writing—traces like the wand (baguette), un dessin dans l’espace (writing)

OG.content: [review of Rousseau] voice immediacy, hieroglyphic immediacy, in and out of nature: [double bind of] need & passion, Rousseau describes une différance supplémentaire [writing/pity]
OG.linkedContent: [review of Rousseau] voice immediacy, hieroglyphic immediacy, in and out of nature: [double bind of] need & passion, Rousseau describes une différance supplémentaire [writing/pity]

OG.content: Rousseau’s first allusion to writing (movement of magic wand [baguette], hieroglyph) holds itself out of reach of all distinction (all difference of need from passion)
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau’s first allusion to writing (movement of magic wand [baguette], hieroglyph) holds itself out of reach of all distinction (all difference of need from passion)

OG.content: l’origine métaphorique de la parole ouvre un oeil au centre de la langue—visibility inscribed in the birth of voice is not purely perceptive, it signifies: writing is the eve of speech
OG.linkedContent: l’origine métaphorique de la parole ouvre un oeil au centre de la langue—visibility inscribed in the birth of voice is not purely perceptive, it signifies: writing is the eve of speech

OG.content: writing had to appear before a question of speech [?]: need before need
OG.linkedContent: writing had to appear before a question of speech [?]: need before need

OG.content: [here] Rousseau privileges writing [?]: speech draws its energy from oral picto-hieroglyphics, from the visible (which has been compared to death)
OG.linkedContent: [here] Rousseau privileges writing [?]: speech draws its energy from oral picto-hieroglyphics, from the visible (which has been compared to death)

OG.content: Rousseau: feigned misfortunes touch more than real ones, we cry at theater but not at other’s sufferings
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau: feigned misfortunes touch more than real ones, we cry at theater but not at other’s sufferings

OG.content: Rousseau cannot declare unity of the advantage of writing (l’intérêt d’écrire), can only describe it in contraband: writing–need, speech–passion
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau cannot declare unity of the advantage of writing (l’intérêt d’écrire), can only describe it in contraband: writing–need, speech–passion

OG.content: for Rousseau, convention pulls language beyond/out of the cry (arrache la langue au cri) w/ consonants, tenses (i.e. articulation): language born out of its own degeneration
OG.linkedContent: for Rousseau, convention pulls language beyond/out of the cry (arrache la langue au cri) w/ consonants, tenses (i.e. articulation): language born out of its own degeneration

OG.content: complexity of zero degree, origin, nothing but a point in the system of supplementarity? [despite what he declares, nothing Rousseau writes authorizes simple origin]
OG.linkedContent: complexity of zero degree, origin, nothing but a point in the system of supplementarity? [despite what he declares, nothing Rousseau writes authorizes simple origin]

OG.content: history of language as history du supplément d’origine
OG.linkedContent: history of language as history du supplément d’origine

OG.content: Rousseau tries to describe a language not yet corrupted by articulation, supplementarity, convention > time of that language: mythic limit btwn déjà and pas-encore
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau tries to describe a language not yet corrupted by articulation, supplementarity, convention > time of that language: mythic limit btwn déjà and pas-encore

OG.content: supplementarity is nothing, not absence, presence, not essence/substance of man: it’s the opening of play (jeu) btwn presence/absence, dislocation of proper of man, the impossibility and thus the desire for proximity to self (pure presence)
OG.linkedContent: supplementarity is nothing, not absence, presence, not essence/substance of man: it’s the opening of play (jeu) btwn presence/absence, dislocation of proper of man, the impossibility and thus the desire for proximity to self (pure presence)

OG.content: supplement extends beyond man: man calls himself man by drawing limits (excluding other): purity of nature, madness, divinity, childhood
OG.linkedContent: supplement extends beyond man: man calls himself man by drawing limits (excluding other): purity of nature, madness, divinity, childhood

OG.content: approach to limits (madness, divinity, childhood, animality, etc.) feared as threat of death & desired as life w/out differance: truth-value of these limit concepts only has meaning w/in closure of game (clôture du jeu), they belong to an epoch of supplementarity
OG.linkedContent: approach to limits (madness, divinity, childhood, animality, etc.) feared as threat of death & desired as life w/out differance: truth-value of these limit concepts only has meaning w/in closure of game (clôture du jeu), they belong to an epoch of supplementarity

OG.content: must be death via grapheme before phoneme: word & thing are referential limits produced/marked by supplementarity
OG.linkedContent: must be death via grapheme before phoneme: word & thing are referential limits produced/marked by supplementarity

OG.content: [excluded 3rd defied by supplement] incompatibles brought together [Freud’s dream interpretation] [double bind]: Rousseau affirms both that which constructs via articulation (passion, language, society, man) & that which is canceled by it (accent, life, energy, passion) [passion both prior to supplement & supplemental] > Rousseau dissociates these contradictions while allowing an intact purity (une pureté inentameé) to both negative & positive
OG.linkedContent: [excluded 3rd defied by supplement] incompatibles brought together [Freud’s dream interpretation] [double bind]: Rousseau affirms both that which constructs via articulation (passion, language, society, man) & that which is canceled by it (accent, life, energy, passion) [passion both prior to supplement & supplemental] > Rousseau dissociates these contradictions while allowing an intact purity (une pureté inentameé) to both negative & positive

OG.content: Rousseau says what he doesn’t wish to say: graphics of supplementarity is not comprised in any dialectic (a concept governed by horizon of presence, eschatological parousia, parole pleine)
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau says what he doesn’t wish to say: graphics of supplementarity is not comprised in any dialectic (a concept governed by horizon of presence, eschatological parousia, parole pleine)

OG.linkedContent: Rousseau looks for a limit “being born (naissante)”: childhood, God, pure language w/out supplement—alibi, in illo tempore

OG.content: [Artaud-like fantasy in Rousseau?] breath (of God), neume, superhumanity, not on the way to humanity (like child), body w/out organs, w/out spacing, pure presence w/ jouissance, inarticulate enough for jouissance de soi to remain uncorrupted by alterity
OG.linkedContent: [Artaud-like fantasy in Rousseau?] breath (of God), neume, superhumanity, not on the way to humanity (like child), body w/out organs, w/out spacing, pure presence w/ jouissance, inarticulate enough for jouissance de soi to remain uncorrupted by alterity

OG.content: for Rousseau, the child has no language because he/she has only one (one organ) > child sometimes on side of humanity, sometimes on side of animality
OG.linkedContent: for Rousseau, the child has no language because he/she has only one (one organ) > child sometimes on side of humanity, sometimes on side of animality

OG.content: heart as organ of pure presence is not an organ, not inscribed w/in system of differences
OG.linkedContent: heart as organ of pure presence is not an organ, not inscribed w/in system of differences

OG.content: Rousseau declares point-zero, but describes…

OG.content: Rousseau knows all factual illustrations of primitive presence are fictive [?], could care less about the facts
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau knows all factual illustrations of primitive presence are fictive [?], could care less about the facts

OG.content: impossible to describe continuity, passage, from inarticulate to articulate, pure nature to culture, plenitude to play of supplementarity > Rousseau attempts to reconcile (concilier) the 2 times after describing the birth, the being-born, of supplement
OG.linkedContent: impossible to describe continuity, passage, from inarticulate to articulate, pure nature to culture, plenitude to play of supplementarity > Rousseau attempts to reconcile (concilier) the 2 times after describing the birth, the being-born, of supplement

OG.content: Rousseau’s “catastrophic” birth of supplement prescribed by chain of concepts
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau’s “catastrophic” birth of supplement prescribed by chain of concepts

OG.content: causality of rupture, both exterior & natural [Rousseau beautifully describes the bridge]

OG.content: [in Rousseau’s archeo-teleology] origin & end are inertia

OG.linkedContent: for Rousseau, only philosophy can think catastrophic factum, which history (historians) can’t; passage can’t be explained structurally; chance, the “surprising,” not part of system, a free & mythic invention

OG.linkedContent: society born by accident to repair the accidental catastrophe (Fall) [birth of supplement] of nature

OG.linkedContent: Rousseau: cradle of nations, first fires of love born at water wells; p. 267 “well of oath” in Genesis XXI

OG.content: [vis-à-vis Rousseau] no opposition applied to passage btwn state of nature & state of society, to becoming-present of presence (a lasting passage like the present in Reveries): a supplementarity, festival (fête), w/out jeu; moment of festival: pure continuity > society formed morrow of festival (indifference of pleasure & desire): de la danse à la loi
OG.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Rousseau] no opposition applied to passage btwn state of nature & state of society, to becoming-present of presence (a lasting passage like the present in Reveries): a supplementarity, festival (fête), w/out jeu; moment of festival: pure continuity > society formed morrow of festival (indifference of pleasure & desire): de la danse à la loi

OG.content: writing threatens song, poem, epic—w/ death
OG.linkedContent: writing threatens song, poem, epic—w/ death

OG.content: obsessive pressure of writing from where it’s held in check, such is the history of metaphysics > obstinate effort to cancel writing : threatens presence, proper, parole ——becoming-language of cry > loss of parole’s plenitude (hollows out in articulating itself)
OG.linkedContent: obsessive pressure of writing from where it’s held in check, such is the history of metaphysics > obstinate effort to cancel writing : threatens presence, proper, parole ——becoming-language of cry > loss of parole’s plenitude (hollows out in articulating itself)

OG.content: for Rousseau, language’s mother is passion, originarily metaphorical, thus need [contra passion] (light, clarity) operates after origin, pro-regresses by mastering, effacing the figure
OG.linkedContent: for Rousseau, language’s mother is passion, originarily metaphorical, thus need [contra passion] (light, clarity) operates after origin, pro-regresses by mastering, effacing the figure

OG.content: Rousseau: need–gestures, passion–words [?]
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau: need–gestures, passion–words [?]

OG.content: need as dispersion, as law of spacing, natural effect of needs separated man > culture the effect of an attempted reconciliation [need closer to nature, passion is purer language?]

OG.content: [vis-à-vis Rousseau’s distinction btwn literal/metaphor] if speech doesn’t pass through reference to object, instead producing sign via literalization of passion, literal expression remains a metaphor preceded by nothing, opening an exchange to the outside: no literal meaning precedes it, no rhetor watches over (surveille) it

OG.linkedContent: for Rousseau, though poet lacks objective truth of object, he comes closer to authenticity/literalness than rhetor/writer > poet speaks from origin of his passionate speech

OG.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Rousseau] absolute fear as original encounter w/ other as other, 1st passion, la face d’erreur de la pitié
